alert.note: Alert for Southern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 11:20AM EST until January 10 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 9 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot above ground level expected in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (7.3 to 7.5 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Southern Plymouth MA County. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 9 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Buzzards Bay at Mattapoisett MLLW Categories - Minor 8.5 ft, Moderate 10.0 ft, Major 12.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 4.4 ft, Moderate 5.9 ft, Major 7.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/06 PM 4.0/ 4.5 -0.2/ 0.3 0.6/ 1.1 1-3 None 10/07 AM 7.2/ 7.7 3.1/ 3.6 2.8/ 3.4 4-6 None 10/06 PM 3.4/ 3.9 -0.8/-0.2 0.1/ 0.6 4-5 None 11/07 AM 4.4/ 4.9 0.2/ 0.8 -0.2/ 0.2 5-6 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
